verses.verse: וַיֶּאֶסֹ֧ף <WH622> gathered יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel שְׁכֶ֑מָה <WH7927> to Shechem וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> and called לְזִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> for the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel וּלְרָאשָׁ֗יו <WH7218> and for their heads וּלְשֹֽׁפְטָיו֙ <WH8199> and for their judges וּלְשֹׁ֣טְרָ֔יו <WH7860> and for their officers וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <WH3320> and they presented לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> themselves before הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto all the people כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> on the other side הַנָּהָ֗ר <WH5104> of the flood יָשְׁב֤וּ <WH3427> dwelt אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> Your fathers מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> in old time תֶּ֛רַח <WH8646> [even] Terah אֲבִ֥י <WH1> the father אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> of Abraham וַאֲבִ֣י <WH1> and the father נָח֑וֹר <WH5152> of Nachor וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> and they served אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> other

וָ֠אֶקַּח <WH3947> And I took אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִיכֶ֤ם <WH1> your father אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> Abraham מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> from the other side הַנָּהָ֔ר <WH5104> of the flood וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> and led אוֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> him throughout all the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan [וָאֶרֶב כ] (וָאַרְבֶּה֙ <WH7235> abundance ק) אֶת־ <WH853> זַרְע֔וֹ <WH2233> his seed וָֽאֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> and gave ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> him Isaac

וָאֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> And I gave לְיִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> unto Isaac אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> and Esau וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and I gave לְעֵשָׂ֜ו <WH6215> unto Esau אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֤ר <WH2022> mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> Seir לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אוֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וְיַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> it but Jacob וּבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his children יָרְד֥וּ <WH3381> went down מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> into Egypt

וָאֶשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> I sent אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> also and Aaron וָאֶגֹּ֣ף <WH5062> and I plagued אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> according to that which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> I did בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <WH7130> among וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> them and afterward הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <WH3318> I brought you out אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וָֽאוֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> And I brought אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and ye came הַיָּ֑מָּה <WH3220> unto the sea וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <WH7291> pursued מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4713> Egyptian אַחֲרֵ֧י <WH310> after אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH1> your fathers בְּרֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> and horsemen יַם־ <WH3220> sea סֽוּף׃ <WH5488> unto the Red

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> And when they cried אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> he put מַֽאֲפֵ֜ל <WH3990> darkness בֵּינֵיכֶ֣ם ׀ <WH996> between וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַמִּצְרִ֗ים <WH4713> between you and the Egyptians וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> and brought עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> the sea וַיְכַסֵּ֔הוּ <WH3680> upon them and covered וַתִּרְאֶ֙ינָה֙ <WH7200> have seen עֵינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5869> them and your eyes אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> what I have done בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וַתֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> and ye dwelt בַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> in the wilderness יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> season רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> a long

[וָאָבִאָה כ] (וָאָבִ֣יא <WH935> abide ק) אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> you into the land הָאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> of the Amorites הַיּוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> which dwelt בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and they fought אִתְּכֶ֑ם <WH854> and I וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> with you and I gave אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> בְּיֶדְכֶם֙ <WH3027> them into your hand וַתִּֽירְשׁ֣וּ <WH3423> that ye might possess אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָ֔ם <WH776> their land וָאַשְׁמִידֵ֖ם <WH8045> and I destroyed מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> them from before

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> arose בָּלָ֤ק <WH1111> Then Balak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צִפּוֹר֙ <WH6834> of Zippor מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <WH3898> and warred בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> and sent וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> and called לְבִלְעָ֥ם <WH1109> Balaam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּע֖וֹר <WH1160> of Beor לְקַלֵּ֥ל <WH7043> to curse אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> was not אָבִ֖יתִי <WH14> But I would לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> not hearken לְבִלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> unto Balaam וַיְבָ֤רֶךְ <WH1288> therefore he blessed בָּרוֹךְ֙ <WH1288> you still אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וָאַצִּ֥ל <WH5337> so I delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> you out of his hand

וַתַּעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> And ye went over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּן֮ <WH3383> Jordan וַתָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to יְרִיחוֹ֒ <WH3405> unto Jericho וַיִּלָּחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> fought בָכֶ֣ם בַּעֲלֵֽי־ <WH1167> and the men יְ֠רִיחוֹ <WH3405> of Jericho הָֽאֱמֹרִ֨י <WH567> against you the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֜י <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <WH3669> and the Canaanites וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <WH2850> and the Hittites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֔י <WH1622> and the Girgashites הַֽחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <WH2983> and the Jebusites וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and I delivered אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> them into your hand

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> And I sent לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH6440> before אֶת־ <WH853> הַצִּרְעָ֔ה <WH6880> the hornet וַתְּגָ֤רֶשׁ <WH1644> you which drave them out אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> from before שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> you [even] the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <WH567> of the Amorites לֹ֥א <WH3808> by בְחַרְבְּךָ֖ <WH2719> [but] not with thy sword וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or בְקַשְׁתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7198> nor with thy bow

וָאֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> And I have given לָכֶ֜ם אֶ֣רֶץ ׀ <WH776> you a land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not יָגַ֣עְתָּ <WH3021> for which ye did not labour בָּ֗הּ וְעָרִים֙ <WH5892> and cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> had not בְנִיתֶ֔ם <WH1129> which ye built וַתֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> not and ye dwell בָּהֶ֑ם כְּרָמִ֤ים <WH3754> in them of the vineyards וְזֵיתִים֙ <WH2132> and oliveyards אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נְטַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH5193> which ye planted אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you אֹכְלִֽים׃ <WH398> not do ye eat

וְעַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now יְר֧אוּ <WH3372> Now therefore fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD וְעִבְד֥וּ <WH5647> and serve אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּתָמִ֣ים <WH8549> him in sincerity וּבֶֽאֱמֶ֑ת <WH571> and in truth וְהָסִ֣ירוּ <WH5493> and put away אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> the gods אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which עָבְד֨וּ <WH5647> served אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <WH1> which your fathers בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> on the other side הַנָּהָר֙ <WH5104> of the flood וּבְמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> and in Egypt וְעִבְד֖וּ <WH5647> and serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> ye the LORD

וְאִם֩ <WH518> If רַ֨ע <WH7451> adversity בְּֽעֵינֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5869> whom לַעֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> to serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בַּחֲר֨וּ <WH977> choose לָכֶ֣ם הַיּוֹם֮ <WH3117> you this day אֶת־ <WH853> מִ֣י <WH4310> unto you תַעֲבֹדוּן֒ <WH5647> ye will serve אִ֣ם <WH518> whether אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֞ים <WH430> whether the gods אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָבְד֣וּ <WH5647> served אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1> which your fathers אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which [בְּעֵבֶר כ] (מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> beyond ק) הַנָּהָ֔ר <WH5104> of the flood וְאִם֙ <WH518> whether אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> or the gods הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> ye dwell בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> in whose land וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I וּבֵיתִ֔י <WH1004> but as for me and my house נַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> we will serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ

וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> answered הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And the people וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> and said חָלִ֣ילָה <WH2486> God forbid לָּ֔נוּ מֵעֲזֹ֖ב <WH5800> that we should forsake אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> to serve אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> other

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God הוּא֩ <WH1931> who הַמַּעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> he [it is] that brought us up אֹתָ֧נוּ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבוֹתֵ֛ינוּ <WH1> and our fathers מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house עֲבָדִ֑ים <WH5650> of bondage וַאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> and who עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> and which did לְעֵינֵ֗ינוּ <WH5869> in our sight אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹת֤וֹת <WH226> signs הַגְּדֹלוֹת֙ <WH1419> those great הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וַֽיִּשְׁמְרֵ֗נוּ <WH8104> and preserved בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> us in all the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָלַ֣כְנוּ <WH1980> wherein we went בָ֔הּ וּבְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> and among all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose עָבַ֖רְנוּ <WH5674> whom we passed בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <WH7130> through

וַיְגָ֨רֶשׁ <WH1644> drave out יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> us all the people וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֱמֹרִ֛י <WH567> even the Amorites יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> which dwelt הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִפָּנֵ֑ינוּ <WH6440> from before גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <WH587> ourselves נַעֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> [therefore] will we also serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֖וּא <WH1931> He אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> for he [is] our God ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto the people לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תֽוּכְלוּ֙ <WH3201> Ye cannot לַעֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God קְדֹשִׁ֖ים <WH6918> for he [is] an holy ה֑וּא <WH1931> he אֵֽל־ <WH410> God קַנּ֣וֹא <WH7072> he [is] a jealous ה֔וּא <WH1931> he לֹֽא־ <WH3808> He will not יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> he will not forgive לְפִשְׁעֲכֶ֖ם <WH6588> your transgressions וּלְחַטֹּאותֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH2403> nor your sins

כִּ֤י <WH3588> If תַֽעַזְבוּ֙ <WH5800> If ye forsake אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֖ם <WH5647> and serve אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> gods נֵכָ֑ר <WH5236> strange וְשָׁ֨ב <WH7725> then he will turn וְהֵרַ֤ע <WH7489> and do you hurt לָכֶם֙ וְכִלָּ֣ה <WH3615> and consume אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> you after אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he הֵיטִ֥יב <WH3190> that he hath done you good לָכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua לֹ֕א <WH3808> No כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD נַעֲבֹֽד׃ <WH5647> Nay but we will serve

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto the people עֵדִ֤ים <WH5707> Ye [are] witnesses אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you בָּכֶ֔ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> you בְּחַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH977> against yourselves that ye have chosen לָכֶ֛ם אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> you the LORD לַעֲבֹ֣ד <WH5647> to serve אוֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> him And they said עֵדִֽים׃ <WH5707> [We are] witnesses

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now הָסִ֛ירוּ <WH5493> Now therefore put away אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> gods הַנֵּכָ֖ר <WH5236> [said he] the strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <WH7130> which [are] among וְהַטּוּ֙ <WH5186> you and incline אֶת־ <WH853> לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> your heart אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> our God נַעֲבֹ֔ד <WH5647> will we serve וּבְקוֹל֖וֹ <WH6963> and his voice נִשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> will we obey

וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <WH3772> made יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <WH3091> So Joshua בְּרִ֛ית <WH1285> a covenant לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> with the people בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and set ל֛וֹ חֹ֥ק <WH2706> them a statute וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> and an ordinance בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7927> in Shechem

וַיִּכְתֹּ֤ב <WH3789> wrote יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these בְּסֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> in the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> of the law אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> and took אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone גְּדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> a great וַיְקִימֶ֣הָ <WH6965> and set it up שָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under הָֽאַלָּ֔ה <WH427> there under an oak אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> that was בְּמִקְדַּ֥שׁ <WH4720> that [was] by the sanctuary יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> unto all the people הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold הָאֶ֤בֶן <WH68> Behold this stone הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> likewise תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become בָּ֣נוּ לְעֵדָ֔ה <WH5713> shall be a witness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִ֣יא <WH1931> it שָׁמְעָ֗ה <WH8085> unto us for it hath heard אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִמְרֵ֣י <WH561> all the words יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> which he spake עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> with וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become בָכֶם֙ לְעֵדָ֔ה <WH5713> unto us it shall be therefore a witness פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> so תְּכַחֲשׁ֖וּן <WH3584> unto you lest ye deny בֵּאלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God
וַיְשַׁלַּ֤ח <WH7971> depart יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> So Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> let the people אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man לְנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> unto his inheritance פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וַיָּ֛מָת <WH4191> died יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> that Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֖וּן <WH5126> of Nun עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> [being] an hundred וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> and ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּקְבְּר֤וּ <WH6912> And they buried אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בִּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> him in the border נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> of his inheritance בְּתִמְנַת־ סֶ֖רַח <WH8556> in Timnathserah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּהַר־ <WH2022> which [is] in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> on the north side לְהַר־ <WH2022> of the hill גָּֽעַשׁ׃ <WH1608> of Gaash

וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ד <WH5647> served יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And Israel אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> of Joshua וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> and all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> and all the days הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> of the elders אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הֶאֱרִ֤יכוּ <WH748> defer יָמִים֙ <WH3117> the days אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after that יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Joshua וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יָדְע֗וּ <WH3045> and which had known אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> all the works יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that he had done לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> for Israel

וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמ֣וֹת <WH6106> And the bones י֠וֹסֵף <WH3130> of Joseph אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֶעֱל֨וּ <WH5927> brought up בְנֵי־ <WH1121> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel מִמִּצְרַיִם֮ <WH4714> out of Egypt קָבְר֣וּ <WH6912> buried בִשְׁכֶם֒ <WH7927> they in Shechem בְּחֶלְקַ֣ת <WH2513> in a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of ground אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which קָנָ֧ה <WH7069> bought יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> which Jacob מֵאֵ֛ת <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons חֲמ֥וֹר <WH2544> of Hamor אֲבִֽי־ <WH1> the father שְׁכֶ֖ם <WH7927> of Shechem בְּמֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> for an hundred קְשִׂיטָ֑ה <WH7192> pieces of silver וַיִּֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> became לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph לְנַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> and it became the inheritance

וְאֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> And Eleazar בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> the son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron מֵ֑ת <WH4191> died וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <WH6912> and they buried אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> בְּגִבְעַת֙ <WH1389> him in a hill פִּֽינְחָ֣ס <WH6372> [that pertained to] Phinehas בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִתַּן־ <WH5414> which was given ל֖וֹ בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> him in mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> Ephraim
